params._l1ERC20GatewayRouter: ERC20 gateway router contract to send tokens to Arbitrum.

returns._0: amount of ETH that this contract needs to hold in order for relayMessage to succeed.

relayMessage(address,bytes).details: This performs similar logic to relayTokens in the normal Arbitrum_Adapter by sending tokens the Arbitrum_SpokePool out of the HubPool.

params.message: The encoded address of the ERC20 to send to the rescue address.

getL1CallValue().notice: Returns required amount of ETH to send a message via the Inbox.

relayMessage(address,bytes).notice: Send tokens to SpokePool. Enables HubPool admin to call relaySpokePoolAdminFunction that will trigger this function.

userdoc.notice: This adapter is built for emergencies to send funds from the Hub to a Spoke in the event that a spoke pool received a duplicate root bundle relay, due to some replay issue.
